thread.title: BRIEF-Dongfang Modern Agriculture Holding Group To Buy 70% Of Bio Health Pharmaceuticals For $18 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Dongfang Modern Agriculture Holding Group To Buy 70% Of Bio Health Pharmaceuticals For $18 Mln

organizations.name: dongfang modern agriculture holding group ltd

text:
April 23 (Reuters) - Dongfang Modern Agriculture Holding Group Ltd:
* ACQUISITION OF 70 PCT OF BIO HEALTH PHARMACEUTICALS FOR TOTAL CASH CONSIDERATION OF $18 MILLION
* INTENDS TO INVEST A FURTHER $5 MILLION IN BIO HEALTHâ€™S FACILITY SUBJECT TO CERTAIN CONDITIONS
* TRANSACTION FUNDED THROUGH TERM LOAN FACILITY WITH CHINA HUARONG MACAU (HK) INVESTMENT HOLDINGS
* TERM LOAN OF $50 MILLION WAS FULLY DRAWN ON 2 JAN 2018 * BIO HEALTH EXPECTS TO REPORT NET SALES FOR CALENDAR YEAR 2018 OF $9.6 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
